meanings.sent1: The tiny flower was even daintier than the others in the garden.
meanings.sent2: She wore a daintier necklace to the elegant party.
meanings.sent3: The kitten's daintier steps made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her daintier voice was like a soft melody in the room.
meanings.sent5: The daintier lace on the dress shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The painting captured a daintier scene of nature.
meanings.sent2: The old house had a daintier appearance after the renovation.
meanings.sent3: The daintier smile on his face revealed his true feelings.
meanings.sent4: Her daintier touch turned the plain room into a cozy space.
meanings.sent5: The daintier details of the artwork amazed the viewers.

meanings.sent1: The ballerina moved with a daintier grace on stage.
meanings.sent2: The antique vase had a daintier design than the modern ones.
meanings.sent3: The daintier pattern on the fabric caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent4: Her daintier features made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The daintier fragrance of the flowers filled the room with sweetness.
